ProfessionalProfile.text-section-1: “Today I have a unique experience of 10+ years in oil and gas sector at various positions in Russian and international companies. The geography of my work in the Russian Federation covers most of the oil Russian regions from Yakutia to Astrakhan, and also includes foreign experience in corporate professional trainings and internships in USA, UAE.
ProfessionalProfile.text-section-2: I have a master's degree from the Scottish University and Tomsk Polytechnic University, and at the moment I am writing a PhD dissertation on the application of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in oil and gas industry.
ProfessionalProfile.text-section-3: In the last 3.5 years I have been working as the head of the development department Center for Technological Development of PJSC Tatneft (Almetievsk), head 3 innovative project programs with 20-25 teams people and support of 50+ projects at different stages of implementation in areas of R&D and ODP. Expected EMV of projects by 2025 is 100+ billion rubles. Projects are implemented according to the Agile methodology, with daily Scrum meetings and support in Trello and CSS.“

item4.headerText:
Chief Specialist of the Department of Geological Support for Drilling, TYUNGD, NK

item4.subTitleText:
The position of the chief specialist includes the duties of issuing
geological targets for drilling horizontal wells and sidetracking. Operational
estimation of reserves in the drilling area. Preparation of geological projects for
drilling of the wells. Real-time well drilling support
time, geosteering. Participation in the renewal of the geological and petrophysical

drilling, field development, design institute, with contractors
HDD and MLWD and GIS service organizations.

item5.headerText:
Lead Geosteering Engineer / Well Placement Engineer,
Schlumberger, Tyumen
item5.subTitleText:
My main responsibility was the geological support of drilling
wells in real time. This position provides for
recommendations for optimal well placement during drilling, on
based on geological and geophysical data, as well as operational assessment
petrophysical properties of reservoir rocks. My responsibilities also included
the following functions: Building a preliminary sector
geological model with a prediction of synthetic logging parameters expected in
drilling process. Analysis of initial geological information and well logging data
by neighboring wells to identify the most productive reservoir zones
and determining the target drilling interval. Generating posting reports
well, which reflected all the key decisions taken in
the process of drilling a wellbore;
In the drilling process, the main tool for making operational
solutions were a comprehensive analysis of LWD, technological parameters of HDD and
GTI data. During geosteering, the following LWD instruments and
MWD, which includes the following types of logging and image logging:
Electric types of logging (KS, BK) - devices - Microscope, Periscope,
ARCvision, Impulse; Directional (azimuth) resistance curves,
Gamma-ray logging (PowerDrive, Slimpulse), Radioactive logging (GGK-P, NNK-T,
GK) - ADNvision, Ecoscope etc. The geography of my work in this position includes
West Siberian, East Siberian regions, Volga-Ural region,
Shelf of the Pechora Sea (Prirazlomnoye field), Caspian Sea, etc.
